text: Two Fyodors () is a 1958 Soviet drama movie directed by Marlen Khutsiev.ДВА ФЕДОРАМарлен Хуциев: певец оттепели и кардиограф эпохи It stars Vasily Shukshin, Nikolai Chursin, and Tamara Syomina. == Actors == * Vasily Shukshin as Great Fyodor * Nikolai Chursin as Little Fyodor * Tamara Syomina as Natasha * Ivan Poletayev as Ivan * Maria Shamanskaya as Fyodor's neighbor == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Marlen Khutsiev
title: Two Fyodors
